channel.title: Home on CodeQL Cheatsheets
channel.description: Recent content in Home on CodeQL Cheatsheets

item.description: Query This folder holds example queries for each language. Properties Type: string Example value: array-access Pattern: /^[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+/$ Type: string Example value: Array Access Type: string Accepted value: go, javascript, java, python, cpp, csharp, ruby Type: string Example value: Finds array access expressions with an index expression consisting of a postfix increment (++) expression. Type: array of strings Example value: ['javascript', 'basic', 'pattern'] Type: string Example value: LGTM Pattern: /[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+/ Type: string Example value: import cpp from ArrayExpr a where a.

item.title: About
item.description: About this site CodeQL Cheatsheets is create to provide CodeQL researchers detailed, varied QL queries references. Our amazing team If you have some questions, feel free to contact us. vovikhangcdv Github hdthinh1012 Github L3on30 Github
